law.catch_line: The Authority may pledge or assign:...

section.section: A pledge or assignment under subsection (a) of this section is valid and binding from the time the pledge or assignment is made.

A lien, security interest, or assignment under subsection (a) of this section:
attaches immediately to the revenues or property pledged and then received by the Authority, without any physical delivery or further act; and
is valid and binding against any person having a claim against the Authority, regardless of whether the person has notice of the pledge, and without the recording or filing of an instrument.
